X.509 extractÂ¶

GMN includes a Python extension that interfaces with the OpenSSL library to extract DataONE session information from X.509 client side certificates.

Install the GNU Compiler Collection (GCC):

$ sudo apt-get install gcc

Install the development version of Python:

$ sudo apt-get install python-dev

Install the OpenSSL library:

$ sudo apt-get install openssl

Build and install the Python extension:

$ cd /var/local/dataone/mn_generic/x509_extract
$ sudo python setup.py install
